class.name: SpineAnimation
class.brief_description: Stores a list of timelines to animate a skeleton's pose over time. The timelines can not be modified through GDScript.
class.description: Stores a list of timelines to animate a skeleton's pose over time. The timelines can not be modified through GDScript.

method.name: apply
method.description: Applies the animation's timelines to the specified skeleton.

method.name: get_duration
method.description: The duration of the animation in seconds, which is usually the highest time of all frames in the timeline. The duration is used to know when it has completed and when it should loop back to the start.

method.name: get_name
method.description: The animation's name, which is unique across all animations in the skeleton.

method.name: get_timelines
method.description: Returns the timlines making up this animation. Modifying the returned array has no effect on the animation.

method.name: has_timeline
method.description: Returns whether the animation has the timeline with the given [code]ids[/code].

method.name: set_duration
method.description: Sets the [code]duration[/code] of the timeline in seconds.
